column5: Got the BPS spring fishing madness flyer in the mail. I see some good deals on baicasters. 40$ off the Curado with another 40 for a trade in reel. With the 25$ gift card I have I can get the Curado for 105$ off or 124$ Pflueger Summit 40$ off. Lucky craft cranckbaits 25-35% off. Lots off other deals
Get a curado, you won't regret it.
Get ME a Curado too.  You won't regret it
I have 4 but I am going to get a new one!!! I'm addicted
hey boss, think it is possible that you scan the flyer? i can't seem to find it.  I have a curado.. don't seem to know how to use it right.. every 5 or so casts there's a big birdnest..
Anyone know how I can get this flyer delivered?  Or is it only delivered to Vaughn and surrounding area?
I think this the link for the spring circular at the BPS on Hwy 400:  BPS Spring Circular  Mike

That link is for the "Cabin Fever" sale; ending march 4th. The Spring sale Bucktail is talking about must be for something different about to start. Funny, was just at Bass Pro today and bought my Abu C3, didn't realize other deals were about to start.

Shimano U.S. pulled out of the reel trade in progam this year south of the border. I was mad I was planning on getting a nice discount with the real trade in program but it was a no go. What can you do.

Buy a Curado they are AWESOME!!!  I have 2 of the 7:0:1 and they were great last year.   Kevin PM me and we can chat I will help you set yours up for ya.  The new Curado300 for you musky guys is also a fantastic reel.
